name: Poly Match
description:
A simple puzzle game in which you restore colourful pictures that have been shattered into clusters of triangles.
Watch the sharp-looking polygons turn into more recognizable and pleasant sights at the flick of your mouse.

Simple features:

  • Hundreds of puzzles to complete
  • Pleasing, colourful artworks
  • Calm, ambient music and sound
  • Points for fast completion
  • Light and dark mode
